titleStmt.title: A seasonable discourse shewing the necessity of maintaining the established religion, in opposition to popery
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
Fell, John, 1625-1686.

notesStmt.note: Ascribed to William Lloyd by Wing and McAlpin Coll.; ascribed also to Dr. Fell. Cf. Halkett and Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
